event_description: First paper published describing the use of perovskites for solar cells, achieving an efficiency of 3.8%
The US Department of Energy announces the SunShot initiative, which aimed to reduce the cost of solar energy by 75% before 2020.

event_name: 1% of global energy demands met by solar
event_description: Solar power contributes to over 1% of the world's electricity demand. In Italy, Germany, and Greece, solar provides more than 7% of the total electricity demand
World leaders at the UN Climate Change Conference agree to long-term goals intended to reduce emissions and address climate change

event_name: Dual-layer solar cell reaches efficiency of nearly 30%
event_description: NREL and CSEM collaborate to achieve a new record with a dual-layer solar cell, using a combination of a silicon cell and a "second-generation" thin-film cell

event_name: Perovskite solar cell with one-year lifetime reported
event_description: Perovskite solar cell with 10,000 hours of stable performance under test conditions, corresponding to a one-year lifetime, is reported, moving towards a solution to the perovskite stability problem
The European Green Deal passes (with an opt-out for Poland), including support for transition to renewable energy as one of the many topics addressed
